articles.description: LOUISE REDKNAPP - who was previously married to ex footballer Jamie Redknapp - has revealed her sons hope 'things will work out' following their divorce, while talking about dating since the couple officially went their separate ways.

articles.description: "I got told to bleach my skin"
articles.content:

articles.author: Ellie Kirwin-Jones
articles.title: Eamonn Holmes details memory of BBC's Bruce Forsyth in heartfelt post: 'To see them nice' - Express
articles.description: EAMONN HOLMES - who presents This Morning alongside his wife Ruth Langsford - has shared a heartfelt post while looking back on one of his memories with late Strictly Come Dancing legend, Sir Bruce Forsyth.
